text: Eghtɨ nɨ kamaghɨn me mɨkɨm, ‘Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgei, Kɨ uabɨ nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamiziba wainɨn dɨpam men gunasava ami, eghtɨ me bar onganigham. Devitɨn ikɨzimɨn atriviba ko, ofa gamir gumaziba ko, akam inigha izir gumaziba ko, Jerusalemɨn gumazamiziba bar, mati wainɨn dɨpam nguazir mɨnem gizɨvazɨ moghɨn, wainɨn dɨpam me gizɨvagham.
